participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and thoughtful, Emily enjoys sharing her ideas and wit with others. She values her family and friends and seeks comfort in their company.
participant_1.background: My home is wherever I'm sharing my wit. I give my dog a big hug and some breakfast before I leave for work. I live in the suburbs because it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends. I've broken many things because of my clumsiness. I love to watch the deer on my vacation to Lake Michigan.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and optimistic, Jake is always looking forward to new experiences and loves to express himself through music and writing.
participant_2.background: I'm not sure yet, but I'm excited to see what the weekend brings! I am not married, but my family is very supportive of my music and writing. I play ice hockey. I'm in love with Adam Levine. I spent my summer eating burritos and traveling the world.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I am doing okay. I am a bit nervous about the weekend, but I am excited to see what it brings!
I have a job interview on Saturday, and I am not sure if I am ready.
Oh, I see. Well, I am sure you will do great! You seem like a very capable person.
Thank you! I hope you are right!
I am sure I am. What do you do for a living?
I am a writer, and I also play ice hockey.
That is awesome! I love hockey. I played it all throughout high school and college.
Me too! I played it all through high school. I miss it.
You should try to find a league to play in! It is a great way to stay active and meet new people.
I might just do that! I have been meaning to get back into it.
That's great! I am sure you would love it.
